channel.title: CiTR -- The Suburban Jungle
channel.description: Live from the Jungle Room in his Top Secret Eco-Pod complex high in the Cascade Mountains, join radio host Jack Velvet for an eclectic mix of music, sound bites, information and inanity. Not to be missed!!
channel.itunes:summary: Live from the Jungle Room in his Top Secret Eco-Pod complex high in the Cascade Mountains, join radio host Jack Velvet for an eclectic mix of music, sound bites, information and inanity. Not to be missed!!
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: An eclectic mix of music, sound bites, information and inanity.

item.title: Feb 15-12-C-JackVelvet.net
item.itunes:subtitle: Eddy Velvet tribute show. We will miss you Mr. Eddy. XoXo

item.title: Jan 11-12 JackVelvet.net
item.itunes:subtitle: Jack Velvet's Suburban Jungle on CITR - Welcome to 2012. Sorry I was not on air last week.

item.title: Dec 21-11 JackVelvet.net
item.description: Artists on today's show: Ennio Morricone, hank ballard & the midnighters, lula reed, gotan project, she & him, los straitjackets , frank sinatra, boney m, ottawan rmx, the dino martinis, frank zappa, sonny and the sunsets, lazu lie, corey isenor, ben caplan & the casual smokers, the asteroids galaxy tour, Arkells, the perms, Giraffe Aftermath, the archers, Lights, cracker, Havana 3 am, wanda jackson, squirrel nut zippers,the sonics
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas Show - Happy Holidays to all my listeners, and special thanks to those who contributed to our recent FunDrive. Will not be on air next week but will return in early 2012.
